arguments.description: - (Optional) The DNS zone to which the Firewall Rule should be added. Will be resolved to upon creation.
- (Optional) The DNS zone to which the Filter should be added.
- (Required) The action to apply to a matched request. Allowed values: "block", "challenge", "allow", "js_challenge".
- (Optional) The priority of the rule to allow control of processing order. A lower number indicates high priority. If not provided, any rules with a priority will be sequenced before those without.
- (Optional) Whether this filter based firewall rule is currently paused. Boolean value.
- (Required) The filter expression to be used.
- (Optional) A description of the rule to help identify it.
